Title: Muumin (1972)
Description: ['A remake of the 1969-70 Moomin series.  This version is more closely based on the books by the Finnish illustrator and writer Tove Jansson.']
Voices: ['Nishimoto, Hiroyuki', 'Kishida, Kyouko', 'Hori, Junko', 'Takagi, Hitoshi', 'Tani, Ikuko', 'Tomita, Kousei', 'Mutou, Reiko', 'Takiguchi, Junpei', 'Otsuka, Chikao', 'Amenomori, Masashi']
